page.title: 03LOCAL NEWS, CWMBRAN
page.content: Cwmbran's most impressive beauty spot Blaen Bran Forest is threatened by the Forestry Commission felling trees and leaving ugly,bare areas of mountain- side.While Manpower Services Commission spends money to improve the area,the Forestry Commission is wrecking the place.Unless a plan is developed to safeguard the area our children will curse us for the dereliction we are leaving them. {WHEELCHAIR HERO-}Chris Hallam,22, disabled when 17,won the Wheelchair Marathon beating the World Record Holder into second place.He was awarded the annual Â£1000 Spirit of Adventure Award by the Captain Scott Society.
